summary: A quick fix for people who want to become a vampire lord without the Dawnguard hating them or if they have cured Serana. Requires Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
This is my first (ridiculously basic) mod.
This mod contains three Bat files which will let you become a vampire lord and:
Get normal vampirism after three days, type in \'bat vampirism\' into the console.
Get normal vampirism after three days and get all vampire lord perks, type \'bat vampirismfull\' into the console.
Get all the vampire lord perks without normal vampirism, type \'bat vampirelord\' into the console.
I got all of the console commands off the UESP skyrim wiki.


-------Installation instructions-------
Remove all of the files from the folder and place them in your skyrim folder.
Load Skyrim and use.

Enjoy!
author: TheWelshSheep
